name: Age of Fear: The Undead King Gold - The Quest for Immortality
summary: Talnes, an aspiring alchemist, always wanted to be a hero. With an ancient tome stolen from his master, he embarks on a journey to find the secret of eternal youth. What kind of challenges await our heroes? Will Talnes reach his goal or be consumed by ancient beasts?
